Harpy.name: wild harpy
Harpy.description: A part avian girl, her tanned skin fading into the dark grey of wingfeathers at each shoulder. Her slender body clad only in a dangerous smile and radiates an untamed desire for satiation and pleasure. Her head is capped with unruly and untamed wild locks of platinum hair spilling down her back and framing her face. While shifting your gaze lower down you see from that downy patch of fuzz at the cleft of her legs you can see the gleam of moisture on those hungry lips.

missText.text: The harpy fails to claw TARGET

hitText.text: The harpy claws TARGET for VALUE damage
